title: What are some of the best technological developments across the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Reversing Paralysis - A brain implant is helping a paralyzed monkey walk again Self-Driving Trucks - If automation is already messing with our economy and our politics, just wait until self-driving trucks arrive Paying with Your Face - In China, you can pay for goods just by showing your face Practical Quantum Computers - You might not know what to do with it, but it’s time to save up for a quantum computer The 360-Degree Selfie - What’s causing the sudden boom in 360 videos in your social feeds? Hot Solar Cells - This device could be a big boost for making solar power much cheaper Gene Therapy 2.0 - How did gene therapy go from experimental disasters to wondrous cures? The Cell Atlas - It’s becoming possible to know our own cells in astonishing, unparalleled detail Botnets of Things - Why website takedowns and other Internet mischief are still increasing Reinforcement Learning - https://www.technologyreview.com/s/603501/10-breakthrough-technologies-2017-reinforcement-learning/

Boy saved with new gentically modified skin: A boy with a rare disease gets new skin, thanks to gene-corrected stem cells New, better than Lithium-Ion battery invented: Lithium-Ion Battery Inventor Introduces Fast-Charging, Noncombustible Batteries Samsung Fab in Pyeongtaek starts production of 64 layer v-NAND:Samsung’s Multi-Billion Fab in Pyeongtaek Starts Production of 64-Layer V-NAND Magic Leap first AR headset: Magic Leap teases first AR headset, Leap One
